info.author: Toni Arnold
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Empirical Morphological Reasoning

Emores is an abductive morphological reasoning engine based on the
Stuttgart Finite State Transducer Tools SFST. Its aim is to
facilitate a guided brute force attack on a specific problem
of word morphology in computational linguistics: extending the lexicon
from word lists obtained from corpora.
info.name: emores
info.html_description:
Empirical Morphological Reasoning

Emores is an abductive morphological reasoning engine based on the Stuttgart Finite State Transducer Tools SFST. Its aim is to facilitate a guided brute force attack on a specific problem of word morphology in computational linguistics: extending the lexicon from word lists obtained from corpora.
